display_name: Average frequency of drinking regular sodas or soft drinks, including Manzanita, Penafiel, Coke, Pepsi, Dr. Pepper, or Mountain Dew, in the past 4 weeks (excluding diet sodas) - Mother
description: In the past 4 weeks, on average, how often did you drink any regular sodas or soft drinks, including Manzanita, Penafiel, Coke, Pepsi, Dr. Pepper, or Mountain Dew? Do not include diet sodas.
